item.title: Open Sourcing BIOS with Coreboot
item.description: I’m often the default “recycler” for old tech from friends and family, which means that I have a healthy pile of phones, computers, kindles, and more, most of which end up in the hands of others when their devices break or when I can help them out with a free upgrade. A few years ago I inherited an old Lenovo W530 laptop from a parent who upgraded to a new mac, and I knew exactly what I had in mind for it - a new “brain” for the arcade machine (MAME Machine) I built back in undergrad.
